Modern Application Architecture - Index¶

Welcome¶

Welcome to the Modern Application Architecture DEMO Guide

The content contained here leverages various modern application architeture toolset to build a customer demo of multi-cloud, multi-cluster modern microservices Platform as a Service to demonstrate F5, Aspen Mesh and NGINX capabilities. The content leverage from the GitHub reposiroty at https://github.com/fbchan/modern-apps-arch-demo-guide.
